list_definition.definition: something said, written or done that is caused by a question etc from another person

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She refused to give an answer to his questions.
The answer to your transport difficulties is to buy a car.

list_definition.definition: to make an answer to a question, problem, action etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Why don’t you answer the letter?

list_definition.definition: to open (the door), pick up (the telephone) etc in response to a knock, ring etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He answered the telephone as soon as it rang
Could you answer the door, please?

list_definition.definition: to be suitable or all that is necessary (for)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We are looking for a solution that will answer all our requirements.

list_definition.definition: (often with to) to be the same as or correspond to (a description etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The police have found a man answering (to) that description.
